      protected void handleShown()
      Description copied from class: CanvasWindow

    • paint

      protected void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Description copied from class: CanvasWindow
      Called to allow you to paint on the canvas. You should not use the Graphics object after you return from this method.
      Overrides:
      paint in class CanvasWindow
      Parameters:
      g - This object offers the methods that allow you to paint on the canvas.
